unnormalised: Urban planning in India faces complex challenges, particularly concerning equitable access to resources. The Dharavi redevelopment project, initiated around 2004, exemplifies this. Prioritizing affordable housing near employment hubs like Bandra Kurla Complex (BKC) is vital. Strict adherence to the 74th Constitutional Amendment Act of 1992 is crucial, ensuring local governance participation at 14:30 hrs. We need strategies addressing rapid urbanization projected until 2050, considering climate resilience and sustainable development goals, last reviewed on 26/01/2023.
normalised: Urban planning in India faces complex challenges, particularly concerning equitable access to resources. The Dharavi redevelopment project, initiated around two thousand and four, exemplifies this. Prioritizing affordable housing near employment hubs like B K C is vital. Strict adherence to the seventy fourth Constitutional Amendment Act of one thousand nine hundred and ninety two is crucial, ensuring local governance participation at fourteen thirty hours. We need strategies addressing rapid urbanization projected until two thousand and fifty, considering climate resilience and sustainable development goals, last reviewed on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three.
